mapper.select: SELECT f.feed_id AS feedId, f.user_id AS userId, f.feed_content AS feedContent, f.feed_time AS feedTime, f.like_amount AS likeAmount, m.user_nickname AS userNickname, m.user_img AS userImg, i.img_name AS imgName FROM FEED f JOIN MEMBER m ON f.user_id = m.user_id LEFT JOIN FEED_IMAGE i ON f.feed_id = i.feed_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Feed_Like (user_feed_like_id, user_id, feed_id) VALUES (SEQ_FEED_LIKE.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{feedId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Feed_Like WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND feed_id = #{feedId}
mapper.select: SELECT m.user_nickname, m.user_img FROM Feed_Like fl JOIN Member m ON fl.user_id = m.user_id WHERE fl.feed_id = #{feedId}
